00005 import newtonERP.module.BaseAction;

00011 public class HelpViewer
00012 {
00013 
00019         public static String getHtmlCode(ActionLink actionLink, int helpDivId)
00020         {
00021                 String html = "<div class=\"HelpBalloon\" id=\"balloon" + helpDivId
00022                                 + "\">";
00023 
00024                 html += "Cliquez ici pour ";
00025 
00026                 String actionName = getActionName(actionLink);
00027                 String entityName = getEntityName(actionLink);
00028 
00029                 html += actionName;
00030 
00031                 for (String word : entityName.split(" "))
00032                 {
00033                         if (!actionName.trim().toLowerCase().contains(
00034                                         word.toLowerCase().trim()))
00035                                 html += " " + word;
00036                 }
00037 
00038                 html += "</div>";
00039 
00040                 return html;
00041         }
00042 
00043         private static String getActionName(ActionLink actionLink)
00044         {
00045                 if (actionLink.getAction().getDetailedDescription() != null)
00046                         return actionLink.getAction().getDetailedDescription();
00047 
00048                 return actionLink.getName();
00049         }
00050 
00051         private static String getEntityName(ActionLink actionLink)
00052         {
00053 
00054                 if (actionLink.getAction() instanceof BaseAction)
00055                 {
00056                         BaseAction baseAction = (BaseAction) actionLink.getAction();
00057 
00058                         if (baseAction.getEntity().getDetailedDescription() != null)
00059                                 return baseAction.getEntity().getDetailedDescription();
00060 
00061                         return baseAction.getEntity().getVisibleName();
00062                 }
00063                 else if (actionLink.getAction().getEntityUsable() != null)
00064                 {
00065 
00066                         if (actionLink.getAction().getEntityUsable() instanceof AbstractOrmEntity)
00067                         {
00068                                 AbstractOrmEntity abstractOrmEntity = (AbstractOrmEntity) actionLink
00069                                                 .getAction().getEntityUsable();
00070 
00071                                 if (abstractOrmEntity.getDetailedDescription() != null)
00072                                         return abstractOrmEntity.getDetailedDescription();
00073 
00074                                 return abstractOrmEntity.getVisibleName();
00075                         }
00076                         return actionLink.getAction().getEntityUsable().getSystemName();
00077                 }
00078                 return "";
00079         }
00080 }
